name: Ashton Plumbing, Heating & Air Conditioning
address: Ashton Plumbing, Heating & Air Conditioning, 4631 Shell Rd Unit 140, Richmond, BC V6X 3M4

featured_reviews.review_id:
We were very happy with Ashton when we had a new furnace, heat pump and demand water heater installed. Their entire team showed great attention to detail and high quality workmanship throughout the whole process. Any questions we had were promptly addressed. I highly recommend this company.
Special thanks to Mo for the detailed assessment/estimate, and Shahed and Japn for the installation.
featured_reviews.review_text:
We were very happy with Ashton when we had a new furnace, heat pump and demand water heater installed. Their entire team showed great attention to detail and high quality workmanship throughout the whole process. Any questions we had were promptly addressed. I highly recommend this company.
Special thanks to Mo for the detailed assessment/estimate, and Shahed and Japn for the installation.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Andrea! Thank you for trusting us with your heat pump and tankless  water heater installation! I'll be sure to let the team know you left them a review, they'll be trilled to hear from you. Thank you again!

featured_reviews.review_id:
5 stars. I'd give 10 if I could for Jason C. If you're in Vancouver give Ashton a call and ask for Jason C.

Jason's not only efficient but honest and reliable. My parents had a leaking sink and two bad toilets. He fixed all their issues and even replaced the two bathroom faucets that were noisy in under 2 hours. Everything works great now and the price was reasonable for the work he did.

Couldn't recommend Ashton and Jason C. enough. Truly a great experience
featured_reviews.review_text:
5 stars. I'd give 10 if I could for Jason C. If you're in Vancouver give Ashton a call and ask for Jason C.

Jason's not only efficient but honest and reliable. My parents had a leaking sink and two bad toilets. He fixed all their issues and even replaced the two bathroom faucets that were noisy in under 2 hours. Everything works great now and the price was reasonable for the work he did.

Couldn't recommend Ashton and Jason C. enough. Truly a great experience
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your review, JX! We're so glad Jason was able to resolve your parent's leaking sinks and toilets! Thank you for choosing Ashton!

featured_reviews.review_id:
We had a small leak in our condo and Ashton was called for an after-hours visit. The plumber who came did a quick inspection and did no repairs - he said he did not have the specific part needed for the fix. He did give us some advice and we did the repair on our own.

When we got the bill a few weeks later, we had been charged nearly $500 for 3 units of overtime.  Both we and our property manager called Ashton but they refused to correct the amount.

Frustrated, my partner posted a Google review, and Ashton replied asking us to call him directly. We called twice and got no response

I would never do business with this company in the future. Please keep in mind that the Google reviews do not tell the whole story
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi KT, I will speak with our commercial and residential departments this morning. Can you please email me directly at info@ashtonservicegroup.com with your contact information? I'm unable to find an account under KT J. I will get this resolved for you. 

Thank you very much for the opportunity.

featured_reviews.review_id: We had an issue with draining and tried to clear it ourselves, which ended with a dislodged sink. We called Ashton after searching online and they connected us with Carlos within a day. Carlos was professional with his work, fixing our sink and doing a major flush with the kitchen pipes. He also provided useful information that helped us understand our plumbing more. Appreciate the knowledge and the assistance!
featured_reviews.review_text: We had an issue with draining and tried to clear it ourselves, which ended with a dislodged sink. We called Ashton after searching online and they connected us with Carlos within a day. Carlos was professional with his work, fixing our sink and doing a major flush with the kitchen pipes. He also provided useful information that helped us understand our plumbing more. Appreciate the knowledge and the assistance!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Ka! Thank you for leaving Carlos a review! We're glad he was able to help reseat your sink! Plumbing problems are never fun, but we're here to make repairs and painless as possible. 

Thank you again for choosing Ashton! I will be sure to let Carlos know you left him a review. Thank you, Ka!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Update: Bejau and Connor came back the last couple of days to finish up the installation. Just like before they're an amazing team and extremely great at what they do.

While there was a bit of miscommunication that led to a bit of delay on the installation (set-up logistics mishap from not seeing the layout of my condo prior to the install team coming in), overall experience on everything else was superb. The reps on the phone were very nice and helpful. The install team that showed up were very professional, nice, and worked very hard to problem-solve the logistics issue while ensuring all strata codes are followed and I was fully satisfied with their proposed solutions (trust me, you don't want to fall out of compliance from Strata rules).

Would highly recommend their services to anyone.
featured_reviews.review_text:

Would highly recommend their services to anyone.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Allan, thank you for your review; we really appreciate it. Ac installation for Strat can often be difficult, but our office and field team have the knowledge and know-how to do it! I will be sure to let everyone in the office and the team that worked on your installation know what a great job they did for you. From everyone here at Ashton, thank you again for choosing us for your heat pump installation.

featured_reviews.review_id: Ashton Technician Shawn Taylor came to perform a diagnostic of my heat pump which wasn't running. He figured it was a faulty thermostat and quoted for the supply and install of a new one. Ashton pricing is definitely pricey, but Shawn was a true professional and is able to find fix my problem quickly. He explained everything he was doing and involved me in his findings. He took the time to diagnose the issue properly unlike other technicians I've had before who diagnosed wrong. He kept the workplace tidy and clean. He also offered a service membership which I signed up for considering it gave a 15% service discount immediately. Shawn is the guy you want to call if you have hvac issues, 10/10 service and expertise.
featured_reviews.review_text: Ashton Technician Shawn Taylor came to perform a diagnostic of my heat pump which wasn't running. He figured it was a faulty thermostat and quoted for the supply and install of a new one. Ashton pricing is definitely pricey, but Shawn was a true professional and is able to find fix my problem quickly. He explained everything he was doing and involved me in his findings. He took the time to diagnose the issue properly unlike other technicians I've had before who diagnosed wrong. He kept the workplace tidy and clean. He also offered a service membership which I signed up for considering it gave a 15% service discount immediately. Shawn is the guy you want to call if you have hvac issues, 10/10 service and expertise.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning Sunny, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!

featured_reviews.review_id: Mo, Brent, Karan and Dominic and everyone else at Ashton was awesome. I had an electrical panel, tankless hot water, and a HVAC to be done over 3 days which I thought was impossible but they got it done in 2 and cleaned my place as well. Would strongly recommend.
featured_reviews.review_text: Mo, Brent, Karan and Dominic and everyone else at Ashton was awesome. I had an electrical panel, tankless hot water, and a HVAC to be done over 3 days which I thought was impossible but they got it done in 2 and cleaned my place as well. Would strongly recommend.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tim! Thank you for your glowing review of our installation team! We're so glad you decided to trust Ashton with your HVAC project!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Shockingly UNRELIABLE service!

I scheduled a service appointment for the boiler at my parent's place in Richmond and was told that the technician will show up between 12pm and 4pm and will notify about half an hour before they arrive.  On the day of the appointment, they called 11 am to reschedule for the following week (same time slot) because a technician was sick.

For the second appointment, I waited for an hour and no one called or showed up.  When I called their office, the representative (Carlos) said that he would check and someone would call me back.  An hour and a half later, no one called.  When I called again, another representative (Stephanie) told me they could not make it that day.  After I told her to cancel my appointment, she offered $100 credit and reschedule me for two days later.  I rejected the offer saying that the credit is of no use to me if no body shows up for the service call as agreed.  She assured me that she would personally notify me about the new appointment.

On the day of the THIRD appointment, I traveled to my parent's place again and waited an hour.  No call arrived from Ashton!  When I called them, the representative (Carlos) told me he would check and call me back.  And no one did!  When I called the office again, another representative (Erin) told me that I got the time wrong and the appointment should have been the next day.  I told her to check with Stephanie, who offered me the credit and new appointment.  Erin kept saying that I got the time wrong.  At that point, I told her to cancel my appointment and I will take my business elsewhere.  She simply said OK.

Funny enough, about half an hour later, Erin (I think) called me back and apologized that the technician could not make it and offered to reschedule it for the next day.  I told her that altogether I wasted more than 10 hours waiting for service and they need to change their business practice.  And I told her I will take my business elsewhere for a second time.

If you need reliable service, find another shop!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: I want to express my sincere regret for the unfortunate incident. We acknowledge that we fell short in handling this matter, and I take full responsibility for it. I am eager for the chance to make amends, and if you are open to it, I would appreciate the opportunity to rectify the situation. I plan to reach out to you later this afternoon for a discussion. Please accept my heartfelt apologies for any inconvenience caused.
